Making taxpayers, in effect, foot the bill for banks' lobbying or campaign activities is not justified under any circumstances, said Bill Lockyer , a 69-year-old Democrat, said in the statement. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' Mr. Mike Pence also enjoys the support of two former GOP congressmen from Indiana-David McIntosh and Chris Chocola , who now runs the Club for Growth. Mike Pence has a Reagan quality to him that is lacking in many of the other first tier Republican candidates, said Mr. McIntosh. Mr. Mike Pence won the straw poll at a gathering of more than 1,000 social conservatives in Washington, D.C., over the summer-besting Newt Gingrich , Mike Huckabee , and presumptive front-runner Mitt Romney .
